mapper.select:
select pro.id, pro.name, pro.product_desc, pro.product_type_id, pro.mcht_id, pro.limit_buy, pro.status, pro.is_single_prop, pro.code, pro.art_no, pro.suit_sex, pro.suit_group, pro.season, pro.brand_id, pro.audit_status, pro.is_show, brand.name as brandName, proItem.stock, proItem.locked_amount, proItem.tag_price, proItem.sale_price, proItem.mall_price, proItem.prop_val_id, proItem.pic from bu_product pro left join bu_product_item proItem on proItem.product_id = pro.id left join bu_product_brand brand on brand.id = pro.brand_id where pro.del_flag = '0' and pro.audit_status = '2' and proItem.del_flag = '0' and brand.del_flag = '0' and brand.status = '1' and pro.id = #{id}
order by proItem.mall_price order by proItem.sale_price

select item.prop_val_id, item.stock, item.sale_price, item.tag_price, item.pic from bu_product_item item where item.product_id = #{id} and item.del_flag = '0' and item.stock > 0
and FIND_IN_SET(#{item},item.prop_val_id)

select item.id, item.prop_val_id, item.stock, item.sale_price, item.mall_price, item.tag_price, item.locked_amount, item.pic from bu_product_item item where item.product_id = #{id} and item.del_flag = '0'
and FIND_IN_SET(#{item},item.prop_val_id)
and FIND_IN_SET(#{propValId},item.prop_val_id)
and item.stock- item.locked_amount > 0
order by item.mall_price order by item.sale_price

select item.prop_val_id, item.pic, item.stock from bu_product_item item where item.product_id = #{id} and item.del_flag = '0'
and(
FIND_IN_SET(#{item},item.prop_val_id) or
FIND_IN_SET(999999999999,item.prop_val_id))
and item.stock- item.locked_amount > 0

select product.id, product.name, product.mcht_id, product.art_no, brand.name as brandName, pic.pic from bu_product product left join bu_product_brand brand on brand.id = product.brand_id left join bu_product_pic pic on product.id = pic.product_id where product.id = #{productId} and product.del_flag = '0' and brand.del_flag = '0' and pic.del_flag = '0' and pic.is_default = '1' limit 1

select pro.id, pro.name, pro.mcht_id, pro.code, pro.sale_type, proItem.sale_price, proItem.tag_price, proItem.prop_val_id, pic.pic as pic from bu_product pro left join bu_product_item proItem on proItem.product_id = pro.id left join bu_product_pic pic on pic.product_id = pro.id where pro.del_flag = '0' and pic.del_flag = '0' and proItem.del_flag = '0' and pic.is_default = '1' and pro.id = #{id} and pro.code = #{code} order by proItem.sale_price limit 1
select FUN_GET_PRODUCT_ACTIVITY_STATUS(#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) from dual

select count(1) from bu_activity_area area,bu_activity ac,bu_activity_product acProduct where ac.activity_area_id = area.id and acProduct.activity_id = ac.id and area.del_flag = '0' and ac.del_flag = '0' and acProduct.del_flag = '0' and area.activity_end_time >= now() and area.status = '1' and ac.status = '6' and ac.coo_audit_status = '2' and acProduct.coo_audit_status = '2' and acProduct.refuse_flag = 0 and acProduct.product_id = #{productId}
select count(1) from bu_single_product_activity t where t.del_flag = '0' and t.is_close = '0' and t.audit_status = '3' and t.end_time >= now() and t.product_id = #{productId}

select p.id, p.art_no, p.brand_id, p.suit_sex, p.suit_group, p.season, p.name, p.mcht_id, p.code, p.is_show, p.limit_buy, p.is_single_prop, P.product_type_id, p.status, p.sale_type, p.product_desc, p.freight_template_id, p.svip_discount, p.is_return_7days, p.shelf_life, p.ccc_no, p.product_type1_id, p.product_type2_id, p.product_type_id, p.year_of_listing, brand.name as brandName, mi.shop_name, mi.shop_logo, mi.shop_status, mi.is_manage_self, ((select ifnull(sum(od.quantity), 0) from bu_order_dtl od where od.del_flag = '0' and od.product_id = p.id) + ifnull(p.virtual_sales,0)) product_sale_quantity, (select count(1) from bu_comment c where c.del_flag = '0' and c.product_score in(4,5) and is_append_comment='0' and c.is_show = '1' and c.product_id = p.id) good_product_score_count, (SELECT pt1.`name` from bu_product_type pt1 where pt1.del_flag = '0' and pt1.id = p.product_type1_id) as productType1Name, (SELECT pt2.`name` from bu_product_type pt2 where pt2.del_flag = '0' and pt2.id = p.product_type2_id) as productType2Name, (SELECT pt3.`name` from bu_product_type pt3 where pt3.del_flag = '0' and pt3.id = p.product_type_id) as productTypeName, (select pe.storage_conditions from bu_product_extend pe where pe.product_id = p.id and pe.del_flag='0')storageConditions, (select pe.place_of_origin from bu_product_extend pe where pe.product_id = p.id and pe.del_flag='0')placeOfOrigin, (select pe.producer_information from bu_product_extend pe where pe.product_id = p.id and pe.del_flag='0')producerInformation, (select pe.approval_number from bu_product_extend pe where pe.product_id = p.id and pe.del_flag='0')approvalNumber from bu_product p,bu_product_brand brand,bu_mcht_info mi,bu_mcht_product_brand mpb where p.id = #{id} and p.mcht_id = mi.id and brand.id = p.brand_id and mpb.mcht_id = mi.id and mpb.product_brand_id = brand.id and p.del_flag = '0' and p.`status` = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and brand.del_flag = '0' and brand.`status` = '1' and mi.`status` = '1' and mi.del_flag = '0' and mi.shop_status = '1' and mpb.del_flag = '0' and mpb.status = '1' and mpb.audit_status = '3'

SELECT DISTINCT pb.id value, pb.name name FROM bu_product_brand pb, bu_product p WHERE pb.del_flag = '0' and pb. STATUS = '1' and pb.id != 0 and p.del_flag = '0' and p. STATUS = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.sale_type = '1' and p.brand_id = pb.id and p.mcht_id = #{mchtId }

SELECT DISTINCT pt.id value, pt.`name` name FROM bu_product_type pt, bu_product p WHERE pt.del_flag = '0' and pt. STATUS = '1' and p.del_flag = '0' and p. STATUS = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.sale_type = '1' and p.product_type_id = pt.id and p.mcht_id = #{mchtId }

select p.id, p.sale_type, p.limit_buy, p.is_single_prop, p.mcht_id, mi.shop_status from bu_product p,bu_mcht_info mi,bu_mcht_product_brand pBrand where p.mcht_id = mi.id and pBrand.product_brand_id = p.brand_id and pBrand.mcht_id = p.mcht_id and mi.`status` = '1' and mi.del_flag = '0' and pBrand.del_flag = '0' and pBrand.`status` = '1' and pBrand.audit_status = '3' and p.del_flag = '0' and p.`status` = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.id = #{productId}

select p.name, p.art_no, p.mcht_id, p.brand_id, p.product_type1_id, p.product_type2_id, p.product_type_id, item.tag_price, item.sale_price, item.mall_price, item.cost_price, item.pic, item.sku, mi.mcht_type, (select FUN_GET_PRODUCT_ITEM_PROP_DESC(#{productItemId},' ')) as productPropdesc, (select brand.name from bu_product_brand brand where brand.id = p.brand_id and brand.del_flag = '0') as brandName, (select ac.fee_rate from bu_activity ac where ac.id = #{activityId}) as feeRate from bu_product_item item,bu_product p,bu_mcht_info mi where p.id = item.product_id and p.mcht_id = mi.id and p.del_flag = '0' and item.id = #{productItemId} and item.del_flag = '0' and item.stock - item.locked_amount > 0 and mi.del_flag = '0'

SELECT brand.id as brandId, brand.NAME as brandName FROM bu_product_brand brand WHERE brand.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT p.brand_id FROM bu_product p WHERE p.del_flag = '0' and p. STATUS = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.sale_type = '1' and p.brand_id != 0 and p.mcht_id = #{mchtId} ) order by id desc

SELECT pt.id as productTypeId, pt. NAME as productTypeName, pt.parent_id as productType2Id, ( SELECT pt2. NAME FROM bu_product_type pt2 WHERE pt2.id = pt.parent_id ) AS productType2Name FROM bu_product_type pt WHERE pt.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT p.product_type_id FROM bu_product p WHERE p.del_flag = '0' and p. STATUS = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.sale_type = '1' and p.mcht_id = #{mchtId} ) order by ifnull(pt.seq_no,99999),id desc

SELECT DISTINCT p.shop_product_custom_type_id_group FROM bu_product p WHERE p.del_flag = '0' and p. STATUS = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.sale_type = '1' and p.shop_product_custom_type_id_group IS NOT NULL and p.shop_product_custom_type_id_group <> '' and p.mcht_id = #{mchtId}

SELECT p.id, p.ref_id, p.`name`, p.source, p.min_mall_price, tp.volume as monthlySales, tp.coupon_amount as couponAmount, tp.zk_final_price as zkFinalPrice, tp.reserve_price as reservePrice, (SELECT pic.pic FROM bu_product_pic pic WHERE pic.product_id = p.id and pic.del_flag = '0' and pic.is_default = '1' limit 1) AS pic FROM bu_product p left JOIN bu_third_platform_product_info tp on p.id = tp.product_id where p.`status` = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.source != '0' and p.del_flag = '0' and p.sale_type = '1' and tp.del_flag = '0'
and p.search_fields like concat('%',#{word},'%')
and p.product_type1_id = #{productType1Id} and tp.is_coupon = '1'
limit #{currentPage} , #{pageSize}

select p.id, p.name, p.svip_discount, (select item.sale_price from bu_product_item item where item.id = p.min_sale_price_item_id and item.del_flag = '0') AS salePrice, (select item.tag_price from bu_product_item item where item.id = p.min_sale_price_item_id and item.del_flag = '0') AS tagPrice, (SELECT pic.pic FROM bu_product_pic pic WHERE pic.product_id = p.id and pic.del_flag = '0' and pic.is_default = '1' ) AS pic from bu_activity_product acProduct, bu_product p where p.id = acProduct.product_id and acProduct.del_flag = '0' and acProduct.refuse_flag = '0' and acProduct.coo_audit_status = '2' and acProduct.activity_id = #{activityId} and p.del_flag = '0' and p.status = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and p.sale_type = '1' order by ifnull(acProduct.seq_no,99999),salePrice limit #{showNum}

SELECT p.id, p.min_mall_price, p.min_tag_price, ( SELECT pic.pic FROM bu_product_pic pic WHERE pic.product_id = p.id and pic.del_flag = '0' and pic.is_default = '1' LIMIT 1 ) pic FROM bu_banner_recommend_product bp, bu_source_niche sn, bu_product p, bu_mcht_info mi WHERE bp.banner_id = #{bannerId} and bp.source_niche_id = sn.id and sn.link_id = p.id and p.mcht_id = mi.id and bp.del_flag = '0' and bp.`status` = '1' and sn.del_flag = '0' and sn.`status` = '0' and sn.up_date <= NOW() and sn.audit_status = '1' and p.`status` = '1' and p.audit_status = '2' and mi.del_flag = '0' and mi.`status` = '1' and EXISTS ( SELECT mpb.id FROM bu_mcht_product_brand mpb WHERE mpb.product_brand_id = p.brand_id and mpb.mcht_id = mi.id and mpb.`status` = '1' and mpb.audit_status = '3' and mpb.del_flag = '0' )
select id from bu_product where `status` = '1' and del_flag = '0' and is_single_prop = '0' limit #{offset},#{fetchSize}
